description: Spelt flour adds a nuttiness to this tasty and healthy savoury breakfast or brunch dish.
name: Spelt CrÃªpes with Spinach & Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the flour and baking powder together in a large bowl, pour over the milk, eggs and half the olive oil and whisk to combine.

Drizzle oil in pan on medium high heat and add the spring onions and mushrooms. Cook for 4-5 minutes to soften, stir in the spinach and cook for 1 minute to wilt. Remove from the heat and stir in the creme fraiche, with a tablespoon of water if necessary to loosen slightly.

In a non-stick pan on a medium heat, drizzle enough oil to lightly coat the pan and pour a ladle of batter in. Swirl to coat the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side. Repeat with the remaining batter to make 8 crepes.
Fill each crepe with mushroom and spinach mix, add grated parmesan and serve warm.
